1.content:
You hear one distante sound from where you're standing now. And you feel that it is approaching rappidly. Sounds like knocking on wood. And you can't stand it any longer.

"Waking up with someone knocking your door its a nightmare" you thought. You cant recognize who the voice belongs to, because you aren't fully awake. But can you hear the word "hurry up." You try to get out of bed and you stand with tremendous dizziness in the head. One step forward, and you end up unbalancing yourself, eventually fall on the floor. With the help of the bed, you get up.

Whoever it was that was knocking on the door, eventually stopped. The sound stopped as well. This helped with the dizziness. You walk to the mirror in your bedroom. Your vision is still a bit blurry but you can see your reflection.

Who are you?
1.title: Another Morning in the Brown's House

11.content:
You twitch one of fuzzy bear ears. "Yup. That's me!" Paddington said. You leave your room, well attic, and come down to the kitchen. "Good morning everyone!" Nobody responds. With more attention, you look around, only to find that no one was in the kitchen.

"Oh, Good Morning to you as well, Paddington" Mr.Brown greeted. You jumped into the air. " I'm sorry, old chap. Are you ok?" He said checking on you.

"I´m Fine. Thanks for asking" you replied in the most British accent. " Where is everyone!?"
"Well, the laddies decided to go out for a shopping day, so they wont be back until the mall closes. Judy is in that field trip to Bristol and Jonathan is in his room. We was calling for you earlier." said Mr. Brown

"So its just gonna be the 3 of us in the house?" you asked
"Two of us, actually. My presence was requested at my office so I must leave at once. Will you be ok were alone with Jonathan?"
"I´m sure it will be wonderful" you said cheerfully
"Well then I'm off. You two have fun".

With that, Mr.Brown left the house. You didn't know whether to go eat something or go to Jonathan. You were feeling quite hungry actually.
11.title: Paddington

111.content:
You climbed the stairs and stopped at Jonathan's door. You knocked.

"Who is it?"
"It's me, Paddington"
"Two seconds!"
111.title: Go to Jonathan's room

1111.content:
While you were waiting for Jonathan to open the door, you started looking around and turned your back to the door. You then hear a creeking noise behind you and what felt like a hand grabbing your shoulder and pulling you inside the room. Inside the room a strange smell assulted your nose and you didnt quite know where it came from. But none the less you dismiss it and talk to Jonathan.

"So what did you want Jonathan?"
1111.title: He opens the door

11111.content:
"Wanna play some games?" asked Jonathan
"Sure. But maybe we could try something other than video games" Paddington replied "Mr. Brown gets furious when when you spend to much time in front of the tv".
11111.title: Games

1111121.content:
"Ok. You had something in mind?"
"Not really. Do you?"
"Well, me and my friends have this thing where we fart on each other for the laughs"
"Uhh... I dont know"
"Lets do it like this... we make a bet. If you win, we play something else. If I win, we play this."

"Fine. What's the bet"
"Humm... Rock Paper Scissors. Best out of 3?"
"Ok."
"You ready? 1... 2... 3!"
1111121.title: Rock Paper Scissors

11111211.content:
"Well you lost, fair and square!" Jonathan said
"Ok ok. So how do we play this farting game..."
"What you have to do is simple. When you need to fart,either you fart normally or you can fart in the other person's face."
"But there is no one here besides you and me!" You noticed
"Precisely" replied Jonathan
"Kinky kid!" you thought "Maybe I should do him the favor and play with him. I might have some fun doing it."

On that moment, you did need to fart for that matter. What are you going to do?
11111211.title: You lose

choices: Jonathan is going to fart on you
1111121121.content:
You were not feeling very confident on walking up to Jonathan and pin him down and fart in his face. So, has he was looking at you, you gave Jonathan a defiance look that made him more anxious to know what you were going to do.

You raise your left leg up. You decide to make it even more taunting to Jonathan, so you put your paw in your rear and fart in it. A long, wet, discussing sound filled the room. The room was filled with a fowl smell of what you ate yesterday. And Jonathan got closer to get a big whiff. the more you farted, the more he got close to you. With every wiff, he felt dizzy, almost wanting to pass out, but in his state of transe, the last thing he wanted to do was cut the fun short.

You stopped farting, and Jonathan was really close. At this point, the room smelled even worse, but noting compared to what you had in mind for Jonathan. But for now, you were just giving him a taste of what was to come. Within your reach, you covered his mouth and nose with the paw that had been farted on and because of your powerful smell, Jonathan was forced to breath in the smelly paw, not that he minded.

For a few minutes he stood there, with your paw covering his nose, breathing nothing but the fart that lingered in your paw. You had complete control of the situation, and Jonathan, and you thought its was funny. Kinky kid...

The moment was broken when your bowels made another rumble. You knew what that meant, so did Jonathan.

"Can you hold?" he asked. "Maybe. What do you have in mind?" Jonathan recomposed himself. "Now it's my turn".
1111121121.title: Raise your leg and Fart

choices: Jonathan is going to fart on you

You were not feeling very confident on walking up to Jonathan and pin him down and fart in his face. So, has he was looking at you, you gave Jonathan a defiance look that made him more anxious to know what you were going to do.

You raise your left leg up. You decide to make it even more taunting to Jonathan, so you put your paw in your rear and fart in it. A long, wet, discussing sound filled the room. The room was filled with a fowl smell of what you ate yesterday. And Jonathan got closer to get a big whiff. the more you farted, the more he got close to you. With every wiff, he felt dizzy, almost wanting to pass out, but in his state of transe, the last thing he wanted to do was cut the fun short.

The moment was broken when your bowels made another rumble. You knew what that meant, so did Johnathan.

"Can you hold?" he asked. "Maybe. What do you have in mind?" Jonathan recomposed himself. "Now it's my turn".
1112.title: Raise your leg and Fart

12.content:
You saw your Reflection on the mirror. You looked terrible. "Oh no, I gotta go to school" you remembered. You took a quick shower and dressed as fast as you could. When you got to the Kitchen and there was no one there except Paddington.

"Where's everyone!? I'm gonna be late for School" You shout.
"Calm down Jonathan. Today is Saturday" replied Paddington " And everyone is out of town for shopping. Even Mrs. Bird. They know how much you hate shopping so they left me here to take care of you"

Your face went from surprise to relief. "Why don't you go change and then we will decide what to do next. We have the whole day for ourselves." said Paddington. You agreed.

While you were undressing you thought that maybe you could call a friend to get together. Then you heard something break downstairs. "PADDINGTON! What did you do!" you shouted.
"I need your help Jonathan! Now!"

Maybe Paddington was hurt, you thought,or maybe it wasnt that serious. Do you go as you are on put something on.
12.title: Jonathan Brown

121.content:
When you got there, there was glass everywhere. Apparently Paddington decided to "clean" the windows on his own. But you where relieved that Paddington wasn't hurt, although he was surrunded by shards of glass and couldnt move fause he didnt wear shoes.
"Paddington?!"
"Jonathan, can you help m...?!" Paddington stared blankly "Why are you naked!?"
"You shoulted help so I came as fast as I could" you replied "Do you want me to go change?". You gave him a stare that you also saw the hypocrisy of his question. He was also naked, you mean, naked without his blue coat.
"No just get me a broom please, and help me. I cant move" said Paddington

You got some flippers on from the lobby and after you helped Paddington clean everything, he licked your face as a sign of thanks. You never noticed how good that actually felt. You kinda wanted him to do it again. Maybe take it to another level.

You shy-fully asked him "Can you do it again?"
"Do what!?" he asked you.
"Can you thank me again, you know, the way you do it?" you asked.
"You mean lick you again?" he asked suspiciously
"Yes" you said firmly

He leaned in closer to you. Paddington approached his head closer to yours. You noticed that his breathing smelled like marmalade, no surprise there. His sudden yawn put you face to face with the insides of his pink cavernous mouth. And at the end of his mouth, was a tunnel you knew you wanted to get more acquainted with. He appologised and procceded to lick you.

His tongue intensified the smell of his morning marmalade and brought some new ones. And some did not smell right. Garbage perhaps? Maybe he was secretly a raccoon. But each new smell left you thinking of what was Paddington eating habits. And if you could become part of his menu.

After he was done licking you, he left copious amounts of saliva. At this point, you were so aroused, you wanted him to fuck you right there and then. Maybe he could use that tongue of his to lubrificate your ass with his saliva. Or you could ask him if he could eat you instead. You already smelled like marmalade, you thought.
121.title: Go help Paddington naked

1211.content:
The moment you were about to ask him if he could eat you, you were interrupted buy the sound of a car noise outside. Your parents were arriving and it made no sence if they were to find you missing and a bear with a stuffed stomach.

A few days had passed since the kitchen incident. But you took every opportunity you got, to help Paddington, no matter how silly it was. And the best part was, you always got thanked the same way.

One day, every one was out of the house again, leaving just you and Paddington alone, again. And you saw the opportunity in this. You couldn't contained it any longer. You had to tell Paddington how you felt.

"Paddington?" you asked as you entered him room.
"Hey! Come in" he greeted, jumping of his bed to come to you
"I... I have something to ask of you".
"Of course Jonathan, anything."

"I... I wa... want you to... to... eat me" you shyfully said.
"What did you say?" Paddington didnt heard you.
"I want you to eat me" you said again more firmly.
"Hmm... Are you sure!? I mean, I can do it but... you're my friend, Jonathan. I could never eat a friend."
"Please please please. Ever since the kitchen incident the other day, I've been waiting to ask you this."
"Well..." he said "Ok. I guess we could try it. But I've never done it so I dont know what to do. Just uhh... get undress."

"Yes he agreed!" you thought. You started to get undressed when Paddington continued. "As you know, I only saw this being done twice with Uncle Pastuso. The first time when he ate an explorer by mistake, and the second time when he told me I needed to be put in place, for being a bad bear".
"You never told me what you did to deserve being called a bad bear. What did you do?" asked Jonahan while getting halfway into his task.
"The first time I did marmalade on my own, I messed the kitchen up and got fully covered in marmalade."
"And then he ate you?"
"Yes and no! He was so angry with me, that he put me in... in his butt"
"In his butt!? Are you serious?" A glimpse of excitement could be noticed in Jonathans voice, but the bear didnt picked it up, since he was to busy reliving that memory.
"Uh... yes! We are a very stretchy kind of bears." Paddington confirmed

When Jonathan was done he stood in front of Paddington. Finally, he was going to eat you, right here and now. "You ready?" Paddington asked. As you were about to respond, Paddington's intestines started to rumble. "I'm sorry" he apologized "I really need to fart. Do you mind?" "Not at all." you replied. "Thanks!". Then a big fart escaped his butt. It immediately filled the room with the disgusting smell. You had no choise but to sniff it. The more you sniffed it, the more you kind of liked it. Then you remembered Paddingtons story and it hit you. Paddington also saw the way you were sniffing the lingingering smell of his fart and he saw how much you were enjoying it. He then had the same idea.

"So, Jonathan. Which way?"
1211.title: Going Inside the Bear

choices: Prepare Jonathan for what's to come
12111.content:
“I think you know which way.”
“Well...” Paddington approached you “Get on your knees” You did what he asked.

You were now on your knees waiting for Paddington’s next order. He then turned around and your eyes were met with his furry butt. “Perfect!” The bear thought to himself.

“What do I do?” You asked. “Before I start I wanna know if you are sure of this. Just stay still, and follow my lead” he replied. He then bent over, making his butt closer to your face. “That has to be the biggest butt ever!” You thought. While you were getting more confused as to the intentions of Paddington (and aroused), the bear grabbed his ass cheeks and parted them reviling to you his anus. You took a whiff at it and the musky aroma from his butt was turning you on.
12111.title: Anal Vore

121112.content: For a solid minute you stood there with you head between his butt cheecks. Then Paddington spoke...
121112.title: Prepare Johnatan for what's to come

1211121.content:
“You... like it?” The bear asked.
“Very! I like everything about you.” your voice as muffled by his two mounds of flesh, but Padding understood you perfectly
“Then you’re gonna like this.” You had an ideia what he meant by preparing you. Mentally you were prepared but, actually doing it was another subject. The bear could feel you shaking in anticipation. "Dont worry" Paddington reasured you "just push in a little further and... put your nose inside" you did as we told. You felt Paddingtons contractions on it. And you knew what was to come. He started to push harder and soon after, he was farting in your face, and the smell was going straight into your lungs.

Now, you liked the smell of his previous fart from afar, but getting it point blank was another story. The force of the wind coming out, the strong smell of something that died inside of his ass, everything was bad, but yet, it felt right. The more he farted and the more you sniffed his farts, the more you were liking it and wanted to smell all of it. This lasted for a few minutes. And you wanted more.

“Still... still want me to eat you?” Paddington asked with your head still in between his cheeks. “Because if you still want it, I... I dont know how to get you out. So, Im not going to push you in very further 'cause if anything happens, I want you to stay near the... uhmm... "exit". I did went to the toilet yesterday, but... since I dont know how long you will be inside, you could end up... surrounded by my... You know what I mean, right!? Is that ok with you?"

You thought about what he just said. You thought about being eaten through the bear’s rear end, and you thought about being surrounded by his embreace and warmth, even if he might not be able to let you out, for what could be a very long time. And even though inside Paddington’s butt might smell horrible, from what you just experienced with his farts, you didnt really care about that. You had fantasised about being inside the small brown bear for weeks on end, getting hard everytime you thought about it. Paddington just gave you a way in through his smelly back door. Where you going to take this opportunity?
1211121.title: Continue

info.brief_description: You are a Member of the Brown's Family. And with Paddington around, stuff will happen.
info.description:
You are entering a gay interactive story based on Paddington the Bear Movie. You play as one of the brown's male family members or Paddington itself. Don't kill any characters.

There are just a few rules:
0.- Try to make everything around Paddington;
1.- All Characters are male. No girls allowed;
2.- No gender swap or having female genitalia. It will be deleted;
3.- Don’t Kill the Characters. No HV, Digestion or Absorption;
4.- No Hard Vore and UB. All the others are fine ( Preferably Anal Vore);
5.- Scat is Allowed: ( Poop, Farts, etc... Farts are Preferable);
6.- Sex is allowed;
7.- Entries will be deleted for Bad Grammar and Spelling;
8.- Completely non-nonsensical storylines and going offtopic will be deleted;
9.- Have fun.
